translations: n.（非正式，冒犯）美籍西班牙人，讲西班牙语的人

phrs.translation: 智能功率集成电路, 国家电投, 小图片

sentences.sentence: Style: Dry red medium-bodied, plum herbs and spic taste.
sentences.translation: 风格：干红，中度酒体，李子，香草及香料味道。

sentences.sentence: I know what it feels like... People have called me names like spic and wetback.
sentences.translation: 我知道那滋味…有人曾经叫我西班牙佬和湿背人。

sentences.sentence: Imagine our surprise when we got to the station and found it spic and span and many times larger than even the Chennai international airport.
sentences.translation: 当我们到火车站后，发现火车站非常干净整洁，甚至比我们金奈国际机场还大好多倍，你可以想象我们有多吃惊。
